question: [Note] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.

qas.question: [Note] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.
[Check] Portugues: Informe how many samples were used in total com base no histograma.
[Detailed] Norsk: Oppgi how many entries fall inside the modal bin basert pa histogrammet.
